hints.label: def-effective-counts-two-scales
hints.title: Effective Interaction Counts (Two Scales)
hints.content:
176: :label: def-effective-counts-two-scales
177: 
178: **1. Softmax Effective Companions** (scale $\varepsilon_c$):
179: $$
180: k_{\text{eff}}^{(\varepsilon_c)}(i) := \left|\left\{\ell \in \mathcal{A} : d_{\text{alg}}(i,\ell) \leq R_{\text{eff}}^{(\varepsilon_c)}\right\}\right|
181: $$
182: 
183: where:
184: $$
185: R_{\text{eff}}^{(\varepsilon_c)} = \varepsilon_c \sqrt{C_{\text{comp}}^2 + 2\log(k^2)}
186: $$
187: 
188: **Scaling**:
189: $$
190: k_{\text{eff}}^{(\varepsilon_c)}(i) = O(\rho_{\max} \cdot \varepsilon_c^{2d} \cdot (\log k)^d)
191: $$
192: 
193: **Properties**:
194: - Grows logarithmically with $k$
195: - NOT k-uniform
196: - Controls softmax companion sums over $\ell$
197: 
198: **2. Localization Effective Neighbors** (scale $\rho$):
199: $$
200: k_{\text{eff}}^{(\rho)}(i) := \left|\left\{j \in \mathcal{A} : d_{\text{alg}}(i,j) \leq R_{\text{eff}}^{(\rho)}\right\}\right|
201: $$
202: 
203: where:
204: $$
205: R_{\text{eff}}^{(\rho)} = C_\rho \cdot \rho
206: $$
207: 
208: for some constant $C_\rho$ independent of $k$.
209: 
210: **Scaling**:
211: $$
212: k_{\text{eff}}^{(\rho)}(i) = O(\rho_{\max} \cdot \rho^{2d})
213: $$
214: 
215: 
216: **Explicit bound**: The effective neighbor count satisfies:
217: $$
218: k_{\text{eff}}^{(\rho)}(i) \leq C_{\text{vol}} \rho_{\max} \rho^{2d}
219: $$
220: 
221: where $C_{\text{vol}} = \pi^d / \Gamma(d+1)$ is the volume of the unit ball in $\mathbb{R}^{2d}$ (phase space).
222: **Properties**:
223: - Independent of $k$

hints.label: notation-keff-superscripts
hints.title: k_eff Superscript Convention
hints.content:
229: :label: notation-keff-superscripts
230: 
231: When we write "$k_{\text{eff}}$" without superscript, the scale should be clear from context:
232: - If discussing softmax, companion selection, or measurements $d_j$: assume $k_{\text{eff}}^{(\varepsilon_c)}$
233: - If discussing localization weights $w_{ij}$, localized moments $\mu_\rho, \sigma_\rho$: assume $k_{\text{eff}}^{(\rho)}$
234: 
235: For clarity in proofs, **always use superscript notation** $k_{\text{eff}}^{(\varepsilon_c)}$ or $k_{\text{eff}}^{(\rho)}$.
